0x00000000.description: Lookup Engine Status Register. Contains read only status information for the Lookup Engine Instance.
0x00000000.name: LookupEngineStatus

0x00000004.description: Lookup Engine Configuration Register. Read/Write configuration information for the Lookup Engine.
0x00000004.name: LookupEngineConfig

0x00000008.description: Lookup Engine Algorithmic Table Types. These Read/Write registers define the location for each of the eight algorithmic table types.
0x00000008.name: AlgorithmicTableLocation%d

0x00000028.description: Lookup Engine Direct Table Type. Read/Write registers define the bits[32:28] of the Small Direct lookup table DLUT32 and DLUT24
0x00000028.name: DirectTableLocation

fields.description: Upper address bits 32:28 of the table
fields.name: Address

fields.description: Upper address bits 32:28 of Small Direct Lookup Table - DLUT24 and DLUT32
fields.name: Address

fields.description: Reset Error-counter in LookupEngineStatus register when set.
fields.name: Reset_Error_Counter

fields.description: What locality to use when accessing the External memory through Tcache
fields.name: MemoryLocalityConfig

fields.description: The recursion limit value is set to limit the maximum number of recursive lookups allowed
fields.name: RecursionLimit

fields.description: It is a saturating counter and Holds the Error-count of Invalid opcode,pull-data-error,dcache-data-error
fields.name: ErrorCounter
